title: Grateful Dead - Mondo Pazzo (compilation)
description:
Grateful Dead - Mondo Pazzo! (a compilation from remasters, bonus discs & a bootleg)

2 CDs (8 tracks per disc)
2 hours and 30 minutes of excellent Dead
320 kbs mp3

This compilation began as a 110 minute cassette tape to be used as a soundtrack for one of those Mondo Movies made in Italy during the 1960s, such as I've posted already on this site (see Women of the World).  Eventually I added a few more tracks on each side for that full-bodied flavor, and burned it to CD.

These tracks are all digital CD rips except for "Around & Around" which I transferred from the cassette and pitch-corrected.

Disc 1

1 New Speedway Boogie (live 1970) - from Fallout from the Phil Zone
2 Dancing in the Streets (live 1970) - from Fallout from the Phil Zone
3 Barbed Wire Whipping Party (studio 1968) - from Aoxomoxoa Sessions bootleg
4 That's It for the Other One > Doin' That Rag (live 1969)
- from 2/11/69 Fillmore East
5 Easy Wind (live 1971) - from Three from the Vault
6 Around & Around (live 1972) - from Dick's Picks Vol. 11
7 Candyman (studio 1970) - from American Beauty
8 Death Don't Have No Mercy (live 1969) - from Fillmore West 1969, 3/2/69

Disc 2

1 The Golden Road (to Unlimited Devotion) (studio 1967) - from The Grateful Dead
2 Can't Come Down (studio 1965) - from Birth of the Dead
3 Dark Star (live 1972) - from Dick's Picks Vol. 31 bonus disc
4 Sing Me Back Home (live 1971) - from Ladies & Gentlemen, the Grateful Dead
5 Hard to Handle (live 1971) - from Road Trips Vol. 1 No.3 bonus disc
6 Cosmic Charlie (live 1969) from Fillmore West 1969, 3/1/69
7 Viola Lee Blues (live 1969) - from Fallout from the Phil Zone
8 California Earthquake (live 1989) - from Built to Last (bonus track)

Enjoy responsibly!
